description: This Java class 'FinetuneService' contains business logic for managing finetune jobs, including creating, retrieving, listing, canceling jobs, and fetching logs.

classes.name: FinetuneService
classes.description: Service class for handling finetune job operations, including creation, status retrieval, listing, cancellation, and log retrieval.

methods.name: createJob
methods.description: Creates a new finetune job for a given dataset and model name, setting its status to QUEUED, and saves it to the repository.

methods.name: getJob
methods.description: Retrieves the status and details of a specific finetune job by its ID.

methods.name: listJobs
methods.description: Returns a list of all finetune jobs with their status and details.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Requests cancellation of a finetune job if it is not already in a terminal state (SUCCEEDED or FAILED).

methods.name: getLogs
methods.description: Fetches the log resource for a given finetune job, throws an exception if logs are not available.

methods.name: getEntity
methods.description: Retrieves a finetune job entity by ID, throwing an exception if not found.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Persists the given finetune job entity to the repository.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a FinetuneJob entity to a JobStatusResponse DTO for API responses.
